content.text: Complete the table
This shape is drawn on a \(1 \mathrm{~cm}^2\) grid
Find the perimeter of the shape
Write down the order of rotational symmetry of this shape
Write down the letter of the shape that is congruent to the shaded shape
Find the mode
Find the median
The number of items that each of 22 people buy in a supermarket is shown in the stem-and-leaf diagram
Key: 1 | 1 represents 11 items
Change 2.7 kilometres into metres
Find the number of hours in 5 days
The flight departs on Friday 22 July at 21 40
The flight takes 13 hours 35 minutes
The local time in Shanghai is 15 hours ahead of the local time in Los Angeles
Find the day, date and time in Shanghai when Hank's flight arrives
The cost of the flight is \(\)920
The exchange rate is \(\mathbb{S}1 = 6.87\) Chinese yuan
Find the cost of the flight in yuan
Hank flies from Los Angeles to Shanghai
Find the value of \(n\) when \(P = 9\) and \(t = 8\)
Find the actual distance between town \(P\) and town \(Q\)
Measure the bearing of town \(Q\) from town \(P\)
Town \(X\) is \(28\mathrm{km}\) from town \(P\) on a bearing of \(140^{\circ}\)
On the scale drawing, mark the position of town \(X\)
The scale drawing shows the positions of two towns, \(P\) and \(Q\)
The scale is \(1 \mathrm{~cm}\) represents \(4 \mathrm{~km}\)
Scale: 1 cm to 4 km
Chung invests \(\)2460$ at a rate of \(3.5\%\) per year simple interest
Calculate the total amount of his investment at the end of 4 years
125 people taste a new drink
Each person gives a score out of 5
The bar chart shows the results
Calculate the mean score
Find the next term in this sequence
Write down the term to term rule for this sequence
Find the \(n\)th term for this sequence
A circular disc has circumference \(250\mathrm{cm}\)
Calculate the radius of the disc
Factorise completely
Expand and simplify
By rounding each number correct to 1 significant figure, estimate the total cost of these books
Write down whether this estimate is greater or less than the exact cost
Explain how you decide, without working out the exact cost
.........  because
Sophie buys 73 books for her school
Each book costs \(21.95
Calculate the size of one interior angle of a regular octagon
The table shows the relative frequency of the games won by a football team
The number of games lost is twice the number of games drawn
Complete the table
Without using a calculator, work out \(1 \frac{5}{6} + \frac{2}{5}\)
You must show all your working and give your answer as a mixed number in its simplest form
Find the equation of line \(L\)
Give your answer in the form \(y = mx + c\)
Complete the Venn diagram
Find \(\mathrm{n}(C \cup B)\)
There are 50 families in a village
\(C =\) {families who own a car}
\(B =\) {families who own a bicycle}
23 families own a car
10 families own a car and a bicycle
6 families own no cars and no bicycles
The diagram shows a sector of a circle with radius \(4.8 \mathrm{cm}\) and sector angle \(45^{\circ}\)
Calculate the area of the sector
